page.title: 19ST.STEPHEN'S CHURCH
page.content: St.Stephen-on-the-Cliffs is a large, cross-shaped church on the north shore of Blackpool. As you walk through the door,it looks very much like any other church, with the visitors' book and the posters in the porch, and the aisle leading to the high altar and the choir stalls; however, to the right of the altar there is an actors' chapel, the only one in the world. It is in remembrance of all actors, and on the right of the altar in this chapel is a plaque with a list of names. The church contains two other chapels, -the Lady Chapel, which is sometimes used for communions or for confessions, and the Chapel of All Souls, where the ashes of dead people are kept; their names are also shown on a plaque.
